CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 17-19 Recently , polymer solar cells based on blends of copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene 20-23 or cyclopentadithiophene 24 with soluble fullerene derivatives PC71BM or PC61BM exhibited PCEs of 3-6.8 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. Copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene: This is a type of polymer, specifically a copolymer made up of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene monomers.
2. Copolymers of thiophene imide and cyclopentadithiophene: This is another type of polymer, a copolymer made up of thiophene imide and cyclopentadithiophene monomers.
3. PC71BM: This is a fullerene derivative, specifically a type of material used in the blend for polymer solar cells.
4. PC61BM: This is another fullerene derivative, also used in the blend for polymer solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene
2. Copolymers of thiophene imide and cyclopentadithiophene
3. PC71BM
4. PC61BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene |
| Copolymers of thiophene imide and cyclopentadithiophene |
| PC71BM |
| PC61BM |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 17-19 Recently , polymer solar cells based on blends of copolymers of thiophene imide and benzodithiophene 20-23 or cyclopentadithiophene 24 with soluble fullerene derivatives PC71BM or PC61BM exhibited PCEs of 3-6.8 % .

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymer solar cells based on blends of copolymers: This is a type of solar cell. It is a property of the solar cells.
2. Thiophene imide and benzodithiophene: These are types of copolymers. They are properties of the copolymers.
3. Cyclopentadithiophene: This is another type of copolymer. It is a property of the copolymer.
4. PC71BM or PC61BM: These are fullerene derivatives. They are properties of the fullerene derivatives.
5. PCEs: This stands for Power Conversion Efficiencies. It is a property of the solar cells.
6. 3-6.8 %: These are the values of the Power Conversion Efficiencies. They are property values.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. PCEs: This stands for Power Conversion Efficiencies. The values 3-6.8 % are the property values referring to the material's performance in converting solar energy into electrical energy.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
